description: Try our easy to follow Veggie Packed Mac & Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mac & cheese,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Video,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Vegetarian,Comfort food,Spinach,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Veggie Packed Mac & Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g no added salt cannellini beans, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Pierce both packets of cauliflower rice and zucchini spaghetti and microwave for 21/2 minutes. Remove and blitz in a blender until smooth. Season with pepper to taste.
Stir together vegetable purée, cinnamon, spinach, parsley and penne, half the beans and half the cheese.
Spray a 2L baking dish lightly with olive oil and pour in the vegetable and bean mixture. Top with remaining beans and cheese and bake for 20 minutes until golden on top.
